None.Name: Blessed Chaos
None.Description: Activate to create a disturbing aura of 20m radius around the caster that will lure all units within on to chaos: units around the caster will not be able to fight or attack. Affects friend and foe alike. Lasts for 10 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
